name: OSC
author: kafeijao
description:
This mod enables interactions with ChilloutVR using OSC. It also focus on compatibility with existing applications. If something is not working create an [issue in github](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/issues) and I will fix it asap.

__**Avatar**__
- Change into new avatars
- Change/Read parameters
__**Inputs**__
- Control your avatar
- Send actions to the game
__**Props**__
- Set/Read prop location
- Set/Read synced params
__**Tracking**__
- Listen to tracking data (location/battery) from `Trackers`, `Controllers`, `HMD`, `Base Stations`, and `Play Space`.
__**ChatBox**__
- Send ChaBox messages and typing events

__**New**__ [python library](https://github.com/kafeijao/cvr_osc_lib_py) to abstract this OSC API with examples!

Refer to the [IN-DEPTH](https://github.com/kafeijao/Kafe_CVR_Mods/tree/master/OSC) documentation for more information.
changelog:
- Fixed Tracking endpoints
- Cached entities for performance.
- Fixed tracking ednpoints (again)
